To install
1. Disconnect from the internet.
2. Run KeyGen.
3. Run CS4 setup.
4. After install completes select Register Later.
5. Exit CS4 setup.
6. Run Activation Disabler.
7. Reconnect to the internet.


*DON'T FREAK OUT; 90% OF THE FILES ARE SMALL EXTENSIONS*


CS4 is one of the most extensive and useful collection of programs to date. If you 

need it - CS4 has it. I cannot  stress this enough: ****DISCONNECT FROM THE 

INTERNET BEFORE AND DURING INSTALLATION**** I don't need idiots doing this wrong  

then criticizing my torrent when it's their brain that doesn't work. It's also 

extremely useful to block these programs from web access using your firewall. The 

keygen is inside and, no, it is not a virus, so don't delete it! 

- ThE Professional
